item.title: ‘I don’t know anything about investing’: I’m inheriting a $150,000 IRA. What should I do with this money?
item.description: “I will have 10 years to complete the withdrawals.”

item.title: ‘Things are getting tougher’: I’m struggling with $145,000 in debt. Should I refinance my 3.5% mortgage?
item.description: “I’m in my upper 40s and have $300,000 in my 401(k).”

item.title: ‘She kicked us to the curb’: My father was worth millions. I suspect my mother is stealing my inheritance. What can I do?
item.description: “My father did have quite a large estate worth $3 million to $4 million.”
